Class PCLRenderingMode

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.fop.render.pcl.PCLRenderingMode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class PCLRenderingMode
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Enumeration class for PCL rendering modes.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
static PCLRenderingMode BITMAP
          "Bitmap" rendering (pages are painted entirely as bitmaps, maximum quality, reduced performance)
static PCLRenderingMode QUALITY
          "Quality" rendering (mixed native and bitmap for improved quality)
static PCLRenderingMode SPEED
          "Speed" rendering (maximum speed with native rendering, reduced visual quality)

 float getDefaultDitheringQuality()
          Returns the default dithering quality for this rendering mode.
